data.message:
Dear Marshall! 
Happy Birthday to you ❤ 
Look, you have 42, but for the years you look so good! ❤ 
Stay in the same incomparable and perfect as Marshall, the same steep as Eminem, the same mad as Slim Shady ❤ 
I want to sincerely say thank you for the "Infinite,The Slim Shsdy LP,The Marshall Mathers,Tne Eminem Show,Encore,Relaps,Recovery,The Marshall Mathers LP 2 "❤ 
Thank you very much for your work, for your strength that you have spent on their albums, they they are ideal, each of the " Infinite" to "The Marshall Mathers LP 2". ❤ 
You unrealistically steep, you were just a man, and now you're a true star, you're the best rapper in the world! 
You unreal amount of fans around the world, know that the fans in Russia for about a million! 
Thank you very much for Slim Shady ❤ 
I love you Marshall ❤ 
I'm-Stan, your biggest fan. 
With love, Stan from Russia ❤
